Has nothing to do with the name of the game and its origins (misleading game title). The game is shoot, loot, repeat and its shooting mechanics are stupid and boring. This is literally what they intended according to hl lost coast and feels like the player is a labrat. Game is a complete waste of time-story is there for bragging rights that it has any story at all, shooting mechanics are worse than hl1, graphics are based on ussr ruins, despite the game being set in the west and the whole game is a chore, not something to enjoy
Fucking best game i sure do hope that the third game gets released
This is a masterpiece of a game.
The cake is a lie.....shit wrong game

This game, and series on that note, beholds the greatest campaign ever played. although a bit tough, it is worth it and rewarding. if you are disapointed by the lackluster ending then try buying the other episodes which are a continuation. either way you will not be disapointed. the ubruptness of the ending is because its not an ending, its just a checkpoint. it has episodes that are completley canon with the storyline, but are seperate purchases. and you dont need half life one or two to be able to buy the episodes.

This game holds up in 2020. The graphics are amazing even in 2020 and the gun play and puzzles are still as hard as they were back then. You should buy this.

this a masterpiece but some level designs -especially episode 1 and 2- are... how can I say? Not good like rest of levels.

One of the best story FPS games I've ever played. I had been seeing this game around along time when i was a teenager but never bothered to play it. When i purchased my PC back in August of 2018, i got this game on sale and HOLY SHIT was it worth it. I got so into the game where i actually got lost for about 15-20 minutes but realized where i needed to go. I wish more story based games where like this. One of the best Valve games to play

Osea es un Half-Life dude! porque no jugarias terrible masterpiece?

My first PC game was Twinsens Oddysey, my first PC platform game was Pitfall, Half-Life was my first FPS, WASD keys were unknown for me until i started playing CS. It was really hard for me finish the game, the first time i was stucked in blast pit, I reactivated one of the lines and i didn't understand that I had to open another lines and power. I stopped playing the game because of that. The next time I played it, I finished the game with a very unknown ending, I was, wow they hired me... and now what?, until Half-Life 2 came. Still had a good story, each ending with the episodes gives you more WOW. I can say, I could put Half-Life 2 before any other FPS for the innovation that Valve did at those days, this is my relic, my holy grail haha. Bioshock is next, but this is the boy who lived and still will live just as Classic Rock.

Please, play it. 

And i still cry watching this vid. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MMYsEJ-vZaQ I'm Sorry Eli
